text: Tsey khto ne mozhe buty spromozhnym prydbaty odruzhytysya bude pidtrymaty morality do BOHA zabezpechuye dlya nykh z Yoho charivnosti. Tsey sered vashykh sluzhbovtsiv shcho bazhayutʹ buty vyzvoleni aby odruzhytysya, vy budete harantuvaty yim yikhnye bazhannya, odnoho razu vy zdiysnyuyete shcho vony ye chesni. Ta dayete yim z BOZHYY hroshovyy shcho Vin podaruvav vas. Vy ne budete prymusyty vashykh divchyn zdiysnyty prostitution, shukayuchy materialiv tsʹoho svitu, yakshcho vony bazhayutʹ buty nevynni. Yakshcho budʹ khto prymushuye yikh, todi BOH, bachachy shcho vony prymushuyutʹsya, Forgiver, Myloserdnyy
